title: update_renv
text: update_renv() function designed used alongside update R version 3.1.X 3.4.X. Usually, use renv package ideal circumstances, allows move R versions keeping package versions (code functionality!). However, change two versions R includes breaking changes versioning packages. function works updating lockfile associated renv project. updates packages break renv, leaving many packages unaffected possible.

title: update_renv
text: couple choices, can use package inside outside project question.

title: update_renv
text: Open project, install dftutils (’ll need ’s project library) Run command dftutils::update_renv(). don’t need specify location lockfile. command automatically check update lockfile, can proceed restore renv library.

title: update_renv
text: Make sure ’re working outside project! don’t need install dftutils ’re reading vignette, presumably already . Run command dftutils::update_renv("<PATH LOCKFILE >"). E.g. lockfile repository, run dftutils::update_renv("dftutils/renv.lock"). command automatically check update lockfile. can open project normal, can proceed restore renv library.

what: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects

text: purpose package create package commonly used, simple utility functions people within DfT make use analytical code. functions code designed work project, general functions use wide range people.

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: package can installed directly Github using remotes install_github call

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: package contains following functions:

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: addSuperScriptToCell: function present text superscript values Excel workbooks. remove_notes: Remove notes headers DfT tables

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: clean_metadata: Remove personal information metadata ODS file add tags want. remove_colours: Drop font colours ODS file favour using automatic font colour. a1_heading: format A1 cells sheets Heading style. convert_to_ods: Automatic conversion xlsx files ods Cloud R.

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: list_sharepoint_drives: Find names Sharepoint drives Sharepoint site. import_sharepoint: Import file stored Sharepoint Cloud R use. export_sharepoint export_sharepoint_file: Export R data objects files Sharepoint.

title: Utility Functions for DfT R Coding Projects
text: recent_file: Search function find recently updated file given directory. round: Mathematical rounding function rounds values end 5 , contrast default behaviour R (round even). writeClipboard: Write data frame appropriately sized clipboard Windows. sqlConnect: Connection string SQL server using odbc. update_renv: Update renv lockfile work latest Cloud R version R (3.4.1)

text: Writes text cell within workbook object adds superscript subscript

title: Writes text to a cell within a workbook object and adds a superscript or a subscript — addSuperScriptToCell
code: addSuperScriptToCell(   wb,   sheet,   row,   col,   text,   superScriptText,   position = nchar(text),   superOrSub = TRUE,   size = "8",   colour = "000000",   font = "Arial",   family = "2",   bold = FALSE,   italic = FALSE,   underlined = FALSE )

title: Writes text to a cell within a workbook object and adds a superscript or a subscript — addSuperScriptToCell
text: wb workbook object sheet sheet within workbook object row row number want write col column number want write text text (including superscript) want written. superScriptText text want superscript position number specifying far along text want superscript occur. Defaults nchar(text), (ie, last position) superOrSub TRUE FALSE want return superscript subscript. Defaults superscript (TRUE) size size font. Defaults 10 colour hex code colour text. Defaults black (000000) font font. Defaults Arial family sure . Leave alone 2 know either bold TRUE FALSE want text bold italic TRUE FALSE want text italic underlined TRUE FALSE want text underlined

what: Security considerations ahead of public release
title: Security considerations ahead of public release
text: Tech lead project: Francesca Bryden Repository checked across following: Code Comments documentation Commit PR messages Issue logs Project boards following: Application secrets Connection strings IP addresses Personal data (including device information) Application tokens Passwords Password strings User names Notes: accordance CRAN submission rules, package description contains names email addresses contributors. DfT email addresses , contributors confirmed happy . project boards issues present repository.
